home.heroTitle: Complete care for men and women… Quality without compromise.
home.prescriptionDesc: Upload a photo of your prescription and we’ll prepare your order quickly and safely.
home.consultDesc: Have a question about a medicine, dosage, or cosmetic advice? A pharmacist will reply quickly and privately.
home.productExample: Panadol Extra Optizorb for extra pain relief and fever | 24 tablets
home.dailyCareTagline: Daily care… a feeling of cleanliness and freshness
home.familyEssentials: Essential products for the whole family
home.energyDesc: Vitamins and supplements that boost activity and focus
home.vitaminChoices: Various options to support your body daily
home.sleepDesc: Supplements that help relaxation and regulate sleep
home.reliefDesc: Effective relief for headaches and daily aches
home.reviewer1Text: “I was hesitant to buy online from a pharmacy, but the experience with Sanad Pharmacies completely changed my mind. Prices are reasonable, there’s a wide variety of care products and vitamins, and customer service was very helpful in answering my questions. Overall, the experience was smooth and comfortable.”
home.reviewer2Text: “What impressed me most about Sanad Pharmacies is their attention to detail—from easy ordering and product selection to fast delivery and high-quality packaging. I felt a genuine concern for customer satisfaction, which made me trust them for my daily needs.”
home.reviewer3Text: “What impressed me most about Sanad Pharmacies is their attention to detail—from easy ordering and product selection to fast delivery and high-quality packaging. I felt a genuine concern for customer satisfaction, which made me trust them for my daily needs.”
home.reviewer4Text: “I tried several stores before, but Sanad Pharmacies was one of the best experiences. The website is well-organized, products are easy to find, and there are multiple options to suit different needs. The order arrived complete and without any issues, which made me feel secure dealing with them.”
home.reviewer5Text: “Overall, an excellent experience. The products are original and clearly sourced, prices are reasonable, and delivery is fast. What stood out most was how clear each step of the order was and how easy it was to track, making the experience very comfortable.”
home.reviewer6Text: “Sanad Pharmacies delivered a premium shopping experience in every sense. From the first visit to the website, I felt confident—both in how products were presented and in the clarity of information. The order arrived on time and in excellent condition, making them my go-to choice for future pharmacy needs.”
home.onePlaceTitle: All Your Health Needs in One Place

singleProduct.returnsPolicy: You can exchange or return this product. Learn more
singleProduct.concentrationValue: Paracetamol 500 mg + Caffeine 65 mg per tablet
singleProduct.usageValue: One to two tablets as needed
singleProduct.maxDailyDoseValue: Do not exceed 8 tablets within 24 hours
singleProduct.reviewer1Text: “A well-known product that needs no introduction. It really helped relieve my headaches, especially after a long workday. I highly recommend it.”
singleProduct.reviewer2Text: “I’ve tried it several times. Its effect is good and fast compared to other painkillers. Suitable for use when needed.”
singleProduct.reviewer3Text: “I use it when necessary. Very effective for head and tooth pain. Reasonably priced and always available.”
singleProduct.reviewer4Text: “Excellent for fast pain relief, especially migraines. It relieved the pain in a short time. I removed one star because it contains caffeine.”
singleProduct.reviewer5Text: “One of the best painkillers I’ve used for headaches. Its effect is fast, especially for fatigue- or work-related headaches. I always keep it at home.”
